channel.title: Where to Change Log-in Background? (317 - Boxingscape Source)
channel.description:
Hello,
I am new here and I'm starting from basically no knowledge, so I have some questions.
Before I overload with questions, I'm just going to start with one. Where would I go to edit the background of the log in screen? I am making a 317 and using the Boxingscape source.
If you could direct me somewhere with useful information, I would appreciate it.

item.title: Where to Change Log-in Background? (317 - Boxingscape Source)
item.dc:creator: @M_And_W M And W
item.description:
@M_And_W wrote:

[quote=“Liquid Magic, post:4, topic:374425”][quote author=mikeandike link=topic=470405.msg3439509#msg3439509 date=1292994222]
you go to like backround.java or something i could help you on teamviewer just pm me ur id and pass
[/quote]try harder. the background should load from a .png, .jpg, etc. if you don’t have one, then just overlap the current one with a new sprite.[/quote]

Thank you. :]

Read full topic
item.source: Where to Change Log-in Background? (317 - Boxingscape Source)

[quote=“mikeandike, post:2, topic:374425”]you go to like backround.java or something i could help you on teamviewer just pm me ur id and pass[/quote]try harder. the background should load from a .png, .jpg, etc. if you don’t have one, then just overlap the current one with a new sprite.
